description: Rod Daily and Phenix Saint have done it again. They overslept and ruined everyone's brunch plans! Paul Wagner and Parker London are annoyed, but they're willing to let it slide...that is as long as Parker can SLIDE his cock into Rod's mouth! This is a true example of what happens when 4 of the hottest studs you've ever seen cum together at the same horny time. It's pandeBONEium! Stand clear, grab your cock, and for goodness sake watch your eyes, because anything can happen when these crazy dudes let passions run wild. Don't miss Rod and his pals finish off this must-see fuck session by covering the hunky Paul in hot, sticky...well you'll see. So much for brunch!Enjoy!
series: R039 - Rod Daily, Phenix Saint, Paul Wagner & Parker London
title: A Morning To Remember
